summary: Melissa Rutherford, a respiratory care practitioner, was charged with unprofessional conduct, substance addiction, and practicing under the influence after being found asleep on duty and admitting illicit controlled dangerous substance use. Her license was initially suspended and then subjected to a minimum one-year suspension and MPRP enrollment via a July 2021 Consent Order. She subsequently surrendered her license in January 2022, citing an inability to comply with MPRP requirements due to a medical condition.
